inputContext: Perform critical review of daily investment report - challenge assumptions, identify biases, develop bear case
biases_detected: Recency Bias - rotation thesis from 2 weeks of data
Confirmation Bias - data woven into bullish narrative
Narrative Fallacy - Great Rotation may be overfitting noise
Overconfidence - precise probabilities without confidence intervals
key_concerns: VIX spike to 60+ history not contextualized
recommendations: Develop realistic bear case with 30%+ probability
